text: I enjoyed SAM. The guide was amazing, thank you.
Went there for NTU School of Art, Design and Media Grad Show 2024. Great space and great FYP work there! Just a tad inconvenient.

Visited the ArtSpace during afternoon. There was not really a crowd so it was a good experience to appreciate the art pieces available. The place was minimalistic and neat, and the art pieces was well placed. There are art pieces here on display but also for sale.
This is definitely a place worth visiting!

Great space for art exhibition. Accessible by public transport but you'll have to walk 700 meters from closest bus stop. Space is excellent and roomy. I saw a one week exhibition there on southeast Asian art. Highly recommended.

Not sure, but it could be called Museum of Contemporary Art now (MOCA). It is a nice gallery with some nice pieces depending on the exhibition. They apparently also have two more galleries that I didnt see.
